author: jared.flatow
content: failed txs which we have no explanation for (these were working yesterday) e.g.  https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x51000f166ff022ec7e4886ee8162dce8488061114b1765a93c7546e706aba5d9, also bunch of issues with etherscan thinking many storage fields are 0 even though they shouldn't be e.g. ETH_ADDRESS here is a non-zero constant https://ropsten.etherscan.io/address/0x17dabab2a55572a6810d06464baafa746963b73c#readContract
